mapper.select: select g.gdsCode, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsDesc, gdsImg, gdsDate, gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode}

select g.gdsCode, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsDesc, gdsImg, gdsDate, gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsCode = #{gdsCode}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (gdsCode, userId, repNum, repCon) values(#{gdsCode}, #{userId}, tbl_reply_seq.nextval, #{repCon})
mapper.select: select r.gdsCode, r.userId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, m.userName from tbl_reply r inner join tbl_member m on r.userId = m.userId where gdsCode = #{gdsCode}
mapper.delete: delete tbl_reply where repNum = #{repNum} and userId = #{userId}
